description: Allows the mob to play dead when attacked by other entities. When playing dead, other entities will not target this mob.
title: Play Dead 1.8.0

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob will remain playing dead.

force_below_health.title: Force Below Health
force_below_health.description: The amount of health at which the mob will start to play dead.

random_start_chance.title: Random Start Chance
random_start_chance.description: The likelihood that the mob will start to play dead upon taking damage.

random_damage_range.title: Random Damage Range
random_damage_range.description: The range of damage that may cause the mob to start playing dead. Damage taken below the minimum value will never cause the mob to start playing dead. Damage taken above the maximum value will always cause the mob to start playing dead.

damage_sources.title: Damage Sources
damage_sources.description: The list of Entity Damage Sources that will cause this mob to start playing dead.

apply_regeneration.title: Apply Regeneration
apply_regeneration.description: Whether the mob will receive the effect of CombatRegeneration while playing dead.
